DftiDescriptor

public DftiDescriptor(DftiConfigValue precision,
                      DftiConfigValue forwardDomain,
                      int[] lengths)
               throws DftiException
Constructor.

Parameters:
precision - DftiConfigValue.SINGLE or DftiConfigValue.DOUBLE
forwardDomain - DftiConfigValue.COMPLEX, DftiConfigValue.REAL or DftiConfigValue.CONJUGATE_EVEN
lengths - lengths of the input dimensions
Throws:
DftiException
Method Detail

commit

public void commit()
            throws DftiException
Commit changes to descriptor.

This method must be called before using the descriptor to compute transforms.

DftiException
